attributes.action: Create a SAFE CROSSING in YARMOUTH ROAD,LOWESTOFT where Girl of SIX was Killed at end of March 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A School girl aged 6 was killed by a 17ton Lorry whilst crossing the Road on way to School. As there usually are Crossings where Schools are,why hasn't there been a proper Crossing here?Heavy Traffic uses this Road every Day,how many more Fatalities have got to happen before the Waveney District Council put one here?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
